header: The Greatest in the Kingdom of Heaven(A)

verse: At that time the disciples came to Jesus and asked, “Who, then, is the greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”
He called a little child to him, and placed the child among them.
And he said: “Truly I tell you, unless you change and become like little children, you will never enter the kingdom of heaven.

header: The Parable of the Wandering Sheep(K)
Dealing With Sin in the Church
The Parable of the Unmerciful Servant

verse: Then Peter came to Jesus and asked, “Lord, how many times shall I forgive my brother or sister who sins against me? Up to seven times?”
Jesus answered, “I tell you, not seven times, but seventy-seven times.
